sentences.en: All that remains is to list the properties characteristic of malignancy.
sentences.cn: 剩下来的问题是要列举一下恶性肿瘤性质的特征.

sentences.en: As the degree of malignancy increased, the number of AgNORs significantly increased.
sentences.cn: 随著恶性程度增加, 核仁组成区嗜银蛋白染色数目亦呈现有意义的增加.

sentences.en: But there is somewhat difficulty to distinguish benign lesions from malignancy.
sentences.cn: 但对于良恶性病变的鉴别尚存有一定难度.

sentences.en: Cancer may also be called malignancy, a malignant tumor, or a neoplasm.
sentences.cn: 癌也可称为恶性 、 恶性肿瘤或异常新生物.

sentences.en: Carcinoma of pancreas is the most common primary pancreatic malignancy.
sentences.cn: 胰腺癌是最常见的原发性胰腺恶性肿瘤.

sentences.en: COX - 2 can become assistant biology index of estimating malignancy.
sentences.cn: COX -2 可以作为判断脑胶质瘤恶性度的辅助生物学指标.

sentences.en: He had surgery for the removal of a malignancy.
sentences.cn: 他做了恶性肿瘤摘除手术.

sentences.en: However , all gastric ulcers should be biopsied to rule out a malignancy.
sentences.cn: 胃溃疡应该作活检排除恶性.

sentences.en: One measure of malignancy is aneuploidy by flow cytometry.
sentences.cn: 恶性肿瘤的检测方法之一是通过流式细胞计显示异倍性.

sentences.en: Pleural effusion cytology was sent and showed suspicious for malignancy.
sentences.cn: 胸膜渗出细胞学被送出和显示疑似为恶性肿瘤.

sentences.en: Regional microenvironment hypoxia is a common feature in inflammation and malignancy.
sentences.cn: 局部微环境缺氧是炎症和恶性肿瘤的共同特征.

sentences.en: The marked pleomorphism and hyperchromatism of surrounding cells also favors malignancy.
sentences.cn: 图中周围的多形细胞和深染细胞也提示恶性.

sentences.en: The patients were divided into two groups ac - cording to benignancy or malignancy of the underlyingdiseases.
sentences.cn: 病人按疾病的良、恶性分为两组.

sentences.en: The stromal elements of cystic nephroma show malignancy more often than epithelium.
sentences.cn: 囊性肾瘤的间质成分较上皮成分更容易恶变.

sentences.en: Tissue that is removed during the operation is checked for signs of malignancy.
sentences.cn: 检查手术切片，以判断是否为恶性。

words.tran_cn: 恶意的；恶毒的；蓄意的；怀恨的
[医] 恶性的；有害的；有恶意的
